mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT C.MODULE_YEAR) AS MALL FROM T_COUNT_MODULE C
SELECT C.MODULE_YEAR,C.ONE_MODULE,C.COUNT_SCORE,M.TWO_MODULE,M.TWO_MODULE_SCORE FROM T_COUNT_MODULE C LEFT JOIN T_COUNT_MODULE_TEMP M ON C.ID = M.MODULE_ID WHERE C.MODULE_YEAR = #{moduleYear}
SELECT C.ONE_MODULE,M.TWO_MODULE FROM T_COUNT_MODULE C LEFT JOIN T_COUNT_MODULE_TEMP M ON C.ID = M.MODULE_ID WHERE C.MODULE_YEAR = #{year}
